game_description: Features of the Game: -ENVIRONMENT- An lush environment where you can relax while hearing the sound of birds and the river -BATES CAIRNS- Have a relaxing moment stacking stones while creating your own amazing pile or structure! -STONE SKIPPING- If your tired of stacking stones you can just do stone skipping! See how many skips you can do! -THE GONG- And when you're tired of it all, go take all your frustrations on the gong! You know its going to feel great! -CREDITS- Splash 1 By Lurpsis (Freesound) AND Water splash 1.wav by Deleted_user_2104797 Licensed under creative commons: 1.0 License https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/ Gong Hit by GowlerMusic(Freesound) AND Water splash.wav by DasDeer Licensed under creative commons: By Attribution 3.0 License https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/ Low Poly Nature Free by _Alexandr Licensed under creative commons: By Attribution 4.0 License https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
